授業目的: The purposes of this lecture are to learn the basic knowledges and frameworks of development economics and understand the challenges that the developing countries are facing and the policy options that the developing countries could take.
到達目標:
(1) Students understand the basic knowledges and frameworks of development economics.
(2) Students understand the challenges that the developing countries are facing.
(3) Students are able to discuss the pros and cons of the policy options that the developing countries could take.
授業方法: (Information for students permitted to take classes online) Sessions 4 and onwards will be held simultaneously via Zoom through a two-way online broadcast. Sessions 1-3 will be on-demand. Details will be announced on the following https://luna.kwansei.ac.jp/webapps/blackboard/execute/modulepage/view?course_id=_202631_1&cmp_tab_id=_238671_1&editMode=true&mode=cpview.

第1回:
Introducing Economic Development①
・How living levels differ around the world?
・How countries are classified by their average levels of development
第2回:
Introducing Economic Development②
・The sustainable development goals(SDGs): A shared development mission
第4回:
Comparative Economic Development①
・What is the developing world?
第5回:
Comparative Economic Development②
・Key similarities and differences among developing countries
・Are living standards of developing and developed nations converged?
第7回:
Classic Theories of Economic Growth and Development①
・Development as growth and linear-stages theories
第8回:
Classic Theories of Economic Growth and Development②
・The traditional neoclassical growth theory
第9回:
International Trade Theory and Development Strategy①
・Traditional theory of international trade
・The critique of traditional free-trade theory in the context of developing-county experience
第10回:
International Trade Theory and Development Strategy②
・Traditional trade strategy and policy mechanism for development: export promotion vs import substitution
・The industrialization strategy approach to export policy
・South-south trade and economic integration
第11回:
Foreign Finance, Investment, Aid, and Conflict: Controversies and Opportunities①
・Private foreign direct investment and multinational corporation
・The role and growth of remittances
第12回:
Foreign Finance, Investment, Aid, and Conflict: Controversies and Opportunities②
・Foreign aid: the development assistance debate
・What is aid for trade(AfT)?
第13回:
Foreign Finance, Investment, Aid, and Conflict: Controversies and Opportunities③
・Does the AfT increase trade?
・What does evidence tell us?
第14回:
Foreign Finance, Investment, Aid, and Conflict: Controversies and Opportunities④
・Policy debates on the AfT
・Conclusion
